message: Let's split it evenly. Fair game?
Your turn Alice, but let's be real - I made you a generous offer last round. This time it's 60/40 in my favor. Take it or leave it, but remember the money shrinks with each round!

Okay, I see you're trying to take advantage of the inflation. Let's meet in the middle. I'll take 65, you take 35. It's still a good deal for both of us considering the shrinking value. What do you say?
Alright Alice, let's not drag this out any longer. 55/45 is my final offer. The money's practically evaporating! Let's be smart and end this here.
